B.name: Material release issuer
B.desc:
The responsibility for excess transportation is with the material
                                    release issuer.

S.name: Supplier authority
S.desc:
The responsibility for excess transportation is with the supplier
                                    authority.

X.name: Responsibility to be determined
X.desc: The responsibility for the excess transportation is to be determined.

ZZZ.name: Mutually defined
ZZZ.desc:
A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and
                                    as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code
                                    list.
